create table user ( user_id integer not null auto_increment, email varchar(255) not null unique, user_name varchar(255) not null, surname varchar(255) not null, birthday date not null, passport varchar(255) not null, address varchar(255) not null, role_id integer not null, password varchar(255) not null, primary key (user_id), foreign key (role_id) references role(role_id))
